articles.author: Derick Kinoti
articles.title: "It’s going to happen...": Jeff Stelling says Jarrad Branthwaite will choose Man United over Man City - Man United News And Transfer News - The Peoples Person
articles.description: Sports presenter Jeff Stelling has backed Everton defender Jarrad Branthwaite to snub a transfer to Manchester City in favour of joining Manchester United. Branthwaite is a name at the top of United's wishlist ahead of the summer transfer window. The centre-b…
articles.content:
39Sports presenter Jeff Stelling has backed Everton defender Jarrad Branthwaite to snub a transfer to Manchester City in favour of joining Manchester United.
